sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: As the coup leaders in Gabon name a new interim leader, the ousted president of the West African nation appears in a video and asks the world for help.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: After the military coup, EU considering sanctions against Niger.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The 80th edition of the Venice Film Festival gets underway with the world premiere of Eduardo de Angelis' Italian war drama, Comandante.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Gavon's co-organizers have announced a new leader of the West African country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: His general, Brice Oligui Nguema, and one of the first things he did was order the reconnection of international radio and television channels.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Officially named the transitional president, Ngema has not appeared in public in the three communiques made so far by the junta.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: But one person who has appeared is the deposed president Ali Bongo, who is under house arrest and has been accused of high treason against state institutions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: In a video released by an anonymous source, the president asks his friends around the world to speak out against the coup plotters.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile in the streets, there are signs of euphoria, but not in the way that Ali Bongo would appreciate.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Thousands of people are demonstrating their support for the coup that's put an end to his family's ruling dynasty, at least for now.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: They've been in power since 1967.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The European Union is considering sanctions against Niger after military forces ousted President Bazoum last month, who was elected two years ago.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Defense and foreign ministers of the bloc discussed various possibilities at an informal summit in Toledo, Spain.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: We are moving forward for an autonomous sanctions regime to take measures against the Putschists.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Work has already started.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Niger is just the latest of a number of African countries where the army has ceased control in recent years.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Experts say that military coups seem to be contagious.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: This means that an unconstitutional takeover of power is no longer taboo, a serious problem for Europe.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Europe has real security concerns emanating from this region and also geopolitical concerns.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Security is related to Islamic fundamentalist terrorism, which has doubled in Mali since Europe and others have pulled out.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: And geopolitically, it comes down to Russia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Russia's created a space for itself that forced Europe to withdraw, and now we're faced with the prospect, as Europe, of a belt of Russian influence along Europe's southern flank, if you consider this part of the Sahel in Africa as Europe's southern flank.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Niger was the EU's second largest raw uranium supplier after Kazakhstan last year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: But despite the recent crisis, an immediate threat to EU supplies doesn't look likely for the moment.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Ukraine's counteroffensive grinds on.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The military says their forces are making gains southeast of the recently liberated village of Robotyna in the Zaporozhye region.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: But tension stalks the Ukrainian forces in their haste.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Like these drone operators, as they fear being struck themselves by Russian drones, they are constantly on the move, trying to keep one step ahead of the overhead danger.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The same sense of haste is in the air in the few localities on the southern front that Ukrainian troops have liberated from Russian occupation in the Donetsk region.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The roads are littered with traces of the fighting, and ruined houses line both sides of the highway.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The soldiers know that autumn is just around the corner, and with it, the rains and mud that slow down any attempted tank advance.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Residents on the front line continue to flee the fighting. Some don't want to go.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: And in the Zaporizhia region, dozens of families with children have been forcibly evacuated to safer areas. As Ukraine tries to break through to the south, the Russian army is trying to break through Ukrainian defenses in the north. The tension in Kupyansk is palpable. Last summer, Ukraine's forces recaptured the city.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Now, Russia is attacking it once more.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The army and volunteers are helping people move away from the danger.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: At least two people have died in Kiev in what Ukrainian authorities say was the biggest Russian air attack on the Ukrainian capital since the spring.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: They were reported killed by falling debris from a drone shot down over the Shevchenkivsky district.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: A number of others were injured in the incident.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: It's not clear how many missiles targeted the city, but regional military commanders said air defences downed more than 20.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: There were also reports of drone attacks on the southern port of Odessa.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: In Russia, drones hit an airport in the western Pskov region, as part of what authorities claim was the biggest air assault by Ukraine on Russia since the war began. Drones were also reportedly shot down over five other areas across the country, including the Moscow region. There were no reports of casualties.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: A day after Yevgeny Prigozhin's private funeral, the Kremlin has said the plane crash in which the mercenary chief died may have been foul play.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: A trickle of mourners continued to lay wreaths at his graveside in St. Petersburg as the investigation into the crash, which killed 10 people, including other Wagner leaders, gathered pace.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Among the theories being put forward, a criminal act. Many in the West believe Vladimir Putin was behind the incident in revenge for Prigozhin's short-lived uprising against Kremlin authorities in June.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Putin's aides have dismissed the suggestion.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The warlord was once a close ally of Putin, but he came to represent the greatest threat to the president's rule with his relentless attacks on Moscow's military leadership over their handling of the Ukraine invasion.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Hurricane Adalia has struck its first blow in Florida,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: making landfall on Wednesday near Keaton Beach on the west coast of the state.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The U.S. National Hurricane Center says it expects the storm to bring wind speeds of up to 205 kilometers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: That's just over 125 miles an hour.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The governor of Florida has appealed to people not to take unnecessary risks.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: DONALD TRUMP, President of the United States of America, Do not go outside in the midst of this storm.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: If it's calm where you are, it may be because you are in the eye of the storm, and those conditions will change very, very quickly. So wherever you are, hunker down and don't take anything for granted here. This is a very, very powerful storm.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Everything points towards Idalia weakening. A couple of hours before making landfall, it was a Category 4 hurricane with wind speeds of up to 225 kilometers per hour.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The U.S. National Hurricane Center expects it to continue advancing through southern Georgia or southern Carolina.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Military planes are transferring some 1,800 people from the Italian island of Lampedusa to the mainland.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The aim is to relieve the intense pressure on the migrant hotspot, which has recently peaked at more than 4,000. The official capacity is around just 400.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Lampedusa is a stepping stone island closer to Africa than Europe. Italy has seen a surge in migrant arrivals, with more than 113,000 so far this year, double last year's total.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: 13,000 so far this year, double last year's total. It's increasingly multinational and more crowded every year. La Tomatina, the festive tomato

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: war that's put the Valencian town of Bu√±ol on the map. This year it's brought together more than 20,000 participants from all over the world. Ammunition is in abundance in the form of 150,000 kilos of very ripe pear tomatoes. The tradition began by chance after a dispute between young people during a party in 1945. Over the years it's become an international event that people have copied in other parts of the world.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Delicious. That's according to Japan's Prime Minister Fumio Kishida.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The Japanese government has released a video of the leader eating sashimi made from fish caught off Fukushima's coast, along with two of his ministers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: It's reportedly part of an initiative to dispel public fears about eating local seafood after contaminated water was released from the stricken nuclear power plant. The water was treated, but many people are wary, and several neighboring countries have voiced their complaints. While the International Atomic Energy Agency has approved of the produce, China has suspended imports.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: They call her Amarena, and for a few minutes she held centre stage in the village of San Sebastiano di Marsi in central Italy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: A Marsican bear, a non-aggressive subspecies of the European brown bear, walked through the streets with her two cubs under the astonished gaze of the villagers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: It's not the first time she's done it.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The residents call her Amarena because of her predilection for that particular local variety of cherry.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Venice rolls out the red carpet and fills with glamour at the opening of its famous film festival. An addition with more Italian and European flavor than ever. And it's for a matter of principle.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Hollywood actors have been on strike since mid-July.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The president of the jury, American director Damien Chazelle, has expressed his support for the walkout and for cinema as art, not as content to feed a channel.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: David Morricone does more from the Serenissimo.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The 80th edition of the Venice Film Festival kicked off with the Italian World War II film Comandante, which replaced Luca Guadagnino's Challengers due to the ongoing writers' and actors' strikes in the US.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: It's a strong sub, as the film finds humanity in the darkest of places, as World War II submariners disobey their orders and save some of their enemies.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: But the main talking point on the Lido at the moment is still the inclusion in the line-up of three controversial directors, Roman Polanski, Woody Allen and Luc Besson.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: It remains to be seen how these films are received, but they will premiere in the coming days.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: From Venice, David Morricont, Euronews.
